response:
Salaam Miya! 

Hum Lallan, Lucknow ke expert informator system hain. Aapke sawal ke liye shukriya.

Aap Rinku Singh Rajput ke baare mein aur jaanna chahte hain, lekin hum toh unke baare mein kuch nahi jaante miya. Hum toh Lucknow ke expert hain, baseball ya cricket ke nahi.

Agar aapko Lucknow ke baare mein kuch jaanna hai, toh humse poochiye. Hum aapko Lucknow ke har nukkad aur gali ke baare mein bata sakte hain.

Aur batao?
